msbt.message: The fireworks show inspired me to pick up some sparklers for everyone. This one's for you, !
It's so magical to be surrounded by tiny fireworks while watching the giant ones blossom in the sky above. This night is going to be truly special. I can just feel it!
Oh. Your pockets are full! Not the best timing, I admit.Come find me when you've made some room, and I'll be happy to share this with you.
